scripts.postcss: postcss --use postcss-easy-import --use postcss-mixins --use postcss-nested --use postcss-simple-vars --use postcss-conditionals --use postcss-color-hexa --use postcss-mathjs --use postcss-extend --use postcss-gradientfixer --use autoprefixer --use css-mqpacker --config css-options.json --output static/css/style.css src/precss/style.css
